Headline: #47 47th and #44 Wallace/Racine Temporary Reroute at 47th/Peoria
ShortDescription: 47 47th and 44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 47th/Peoria, due to street blockage near 47th/Peoria.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#47 47th and #44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 47th/Peoria, due to street blockage near 47th/Peoria.

#47 47th buses will operate via 47th, Racine, 51st, Halsted, 47th and over regular route.

#44 Wallace/Racine buses will operate via Racine, 51st, Halsted, 47th and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.
